name: From Village to Empire
description: From Village to Empire is an indie turn based strategy game with a historical setting. Build cities, research technologies, and train units to discover new lands and conquer the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: Dual Core 3 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory Storage: 100 MB available space
